name: North Pole Mailroom
description:
Christmas is on the way and the mail is piling up at the North Pole! Sort as many letters as you can before the time runs out! 

How to Play: Use the Mouse to grab a letter then put it in the appropriate box. The clock on the wall will show you how much time you have left. 

Created for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022!

Code/Art: rsvp asap

Music: Jingle Bells 8Bit" by Tim Beek (timbeek.com)

SFX: bart, SubspaceAudio, Little Robot Sound Factory
